Posts.Content: Thank you for the wonderful input. My Onc loves natural supplements too. I did 5 years of Tamoxifin for my first round of BC.. I am no longer Er/Pr positive now. So hormonal therapy is not an option. My markers are nearly clear and free. last Pet/CT show stable on all areas of Bone Mets, which are innumerable. My arm is the worst for discomfort. I just do not like taking higher levels of Percocet. With a family of 4 , and very active in after school , I need to be clear headed during late afternoon/eveing. Luckily the 2 oldest drive, but attend college nearby. Thankfully. My 3rd started Ohio State in Sept ( thank goodness for her athletic ablity and Scholarship. She is a Lacrosse Goalie. My yougest a junior in HS only has permit. Sorry for the long winded response. I am grateful you took the time to respond so quickly and with great information. Original BC 11/2004  ACT Radiation Herception 1yr. Tamoxifin 5 Yrs. 2nd Diagignosis 11/2011  presented as a massive Plueral Effusion, Surgery to remedy that. Chemo Abraxane 3 months, Herception 1/3 weeks , Zometa monthly. I just wasnt sure what other chemo could be used to replace Tykerb. The Tykerb rep even said he had never heard of such severity to medication. Oh well, I am a fighter and will much thru the fields of war to overcoe this too. With a loving supoort from family and friends is a tremendous help to me.
Posts.Title: Tykerb not tolerable what's next for Stage IV Breast Bone Mets?

Posts.Content: I ws taking Tykerb 750mg daily lowered to 500 daily . still my body could not tolerate this medication. Has anyone else been removed from Tykerb to another drug in arsenal? My Dr remains quiet for now on another drug being used. Please help. nancy DSB
Posts.Title: Tykerb not tolerable what's next for Stage IV Breast Bone Mets?

Posts.Content: OK Big C back, 40 lesions in Brain. Dr VERY confident to remove 39 completely (1) 2cm might prove a bit harder or more of a direct beam. I also am taking Temador ( chemo pill). Anyone have a similar situation? Thanks for all your hlep, I want to get off the roller coaster  this week. Too much to do, be at my kids functions and stay awake lol Thanks you Nancy D
Posts.Title: Breast Mets to BRAIN...

Posts.Content: I have been taking Zometa for the Bone Mets. My Onc Dr is only waitnig for my insurance to partake in covering costs of this new drug. All trial history had wonderful results compared to Zometa and others. Zomet only gives me mild side effects. Usually about one week after getting Zometa I have mild bone aches, I add one more pain reliver for the week it lasts.
Posts.Title: denosomab for bone mets
